title: Northanger Abbey - fourth sentence produces effect

content.question: The statement in the fourth sentence (“Alas . . . regard”) produces its effect primarily by

choices.label: describing a technical goal of many novelists
overstating the extent of an aesthetic problem
implying a type of conspiracy among female authors
imagining a kind of sisterhood among fictional protagonists

content.answer: imagining a kind of sisterhood among fictional protagonists

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
